title: { Who can identity these Paris Hilton fonts }
content:
Does anyone recognise these fonts?  
Perhaps anyone knows who designed the logo and the packaging?  
 [http://www.characters.nl/rss/ParisHiltonfont.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419013302/http:/www.characters.nl/rss/ParisHiltonfont.jpg "http://www.characters.nl/rss/ParisHiltonfont.jpg")
author: Rene Verkaart

comments.content: Could be Bembo for the "Prosecco" bit

The Helvetica is correct, but the text 'Prosecco' isn't Bembo. Here's a detailed image:  
 [http://www.characters.nl/rss/ParisHiltonfont2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419013302/http:/www.characters.nl/rss/ParisHiltonfont2.jpg "http://www.characters.nl/rss/ParisHiltonfont2.jpg")

The 'S' is totally different aa are the serifs. Any other suggestions?

THX,  
®

Yo, that's it. Thanks for your help.

®

No wait, there's one more font I'd need. This is the font used for the product names 'Passion' and 'Royal'. Any takers?  
 [http://www.characters.nl/rss/richprosecco3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419013302/http:/www.characters.nl/rss/richprosecco3.jpg "http://www.characters.nl/rss/richprosecco3.jpg")
Fantastic, that's it. Thanx a lot!
